overview: A found text from a darkroom thermometer package provides instructions for healing the wounds of this world, with help from a foosball player posing as a Cycladic figure. Spanning time and space from Bronze-Age Ano Syros to present-day Los Angeles, “…everything that we see in life is something of a shadow cast by that which we do not see. Plato was right.” - Dr. Martin Luther King Jr.  -KD
title: Cycladic Thermometer
